item.title: Alison add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "In this world, there are things you can only do alone, and things you can only do with somebody else. It's important to combine the two in just the right amount." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Alison add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Chance encounters are what keep us going." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Alison add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Narrow minds devoid of imagination. Intolerance, theories cut off from reality, empty terminology, usurped ideals, inflexible systems. Those are the things that really frighten me. What I absolutely fear and loathe." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Alison add a quote by Paolo Coehlo
item.description: "But there is suffering in life, and there are defeats. No one can avoid them. But it's better to lose some of the battles in the struggles for your dreams than to be defeated without ever knowing what you're fighting for" -- Paolo Coehlo
